text: Olwa Nyasaye yaboola mbu ; â€œEwe Isah esie nditsa okhubukula ne nditsa okhukulusia ewanje ne nditsa okhukhuliinda okhurulana nende Abakhayi balia ne nditsa okhura balia bakhuloonda hekulu wabalia bakhukhaya okhula inyanga yeyindukho. Ne amakalushilo kenyu kaliba khwisie, ndilibabusilia kalia kamwakabukhananga
